menu.name: Skyblock Stranded
menu.description: Looking for a challenge? Try out the new Stranded mode where you can play solo or co-op, ironman rules apply, and most importantly... You can't leave your island!.

menu.title: Lemon Desert
menu.description: Traditional homemade Italian Lemon Ricotta Cake.

menu.title: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.

menu.title: Pasta
menu.description: Penne with fried aubergines, cherry tomatoes, tomato sauce, fresh chilli, garlic, basil & salted ricotta cheese.

menu.title: Bruschetta
menu.description: Oven-baked bruschetta stuffed with tomatos and herbs.
